description:
After being chosen as the anchors for their class in a marathon, Kyosuke and Madoka end up fighting when Madoka refuses, which only pushes Kyosuke to try even harder.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyosuke and Madoka in a Big Fight! A Three-Legged Race of Love
Kyousuke Madoka Oogenka! Koi no Nininsankyaku
恭介まどか大ゲンカ!恋の二人三脚
